items.title: Stanley Quencher H2.0 FlowState Stainless Steel Vacuum Insulated Tumbler with Lid and Straw for Water, Iced Tea or Coffee, Smoothie and More, Rose Quartz 2.0, 30 OZ / 0.89 L

amazon_reviews.review_title: My New Favorite Tumbler! Perfect for Every Day! 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟
amazon_reviews.review_comment:
The Stanley Tumbler has quickly become my go-to for staying hydrated throughout the day! The design is both stylish and practical, making it perfect for work, the gym, or on-the-go errands.

What stands out the most is its impressive insulation—it keeps my drinks ice-cold for hours, and I’ve even noticed my coffee stays hot longer than with other tumblers. The sturdy handle and secure lid make it super convenient to carry around, and I haven’t had any issues with leaks.

The large capacity is a game-changer; I no longer need constant refills, and it helps me hit my hydration goals easily. If you’re looking for a durable, high-quality tumbler that looks great and works even better, I can’t recommend this one enough!

As the headline states, this is a great product. It keeps my water cold all day, the handle is very efficient, it fits in my car's cup holder, and the color is adorable. I've had it for a few months now and haven't experienced any paint chipping or dents. I would say that this product is worth the price.

absolutely love this tumbler! The 30 oz size is perfect for my daily routine—it fits perfectly in my car cupholder, is great for work, and I find myself refilling it 2-3 times a day. The handle and straw make it super convenient, and the twist-on 3-way lid is a thoughtful touch.

The Almond Rose color is gorgeous, and the stainless steel insulation keeps my drinks cold for hours. It’s durable, stylish, and practical—everything I need in a tumbler. Highly recommend for anyone on the go!

These drinking apparatuses are durable, mostly leak proof depending on the lid you use, relatively easy to open, large handle or slim bottom make it easy to carry (Stanley does make other lids, one that has a top handle to use for carrying) they’re a little expensive but they last so they are worth the money.

This is the tumbler I ever have , it holds my water and juice cool for the entire day. It’s easy to hold when I’m working and when I’m home , it’s definitely value for money , the size is perfect it’s the right amount of liquid for the day , it’s scratch resistant and durable as well. Best tumbler ever!!!!!!!!

amazon_reviews.review_title: Another Cup to add to the collection!
amazon_reviews.review_comment:
Another beauty to add to my collection! This cup is sleek and love the black on black writing! Able to keep this cup overnight and still have ice inside the next day!

Wish the lid and straw were leak-proof- but a great and sturdy cup nonetheless! A little larger but still fits perfectly in my cup holder! Easy to clean as inside is stainless! Great cup overall for the price!

I'm a stanley girl, always have been, this cup was so cute i just HAD to addd it to my collection but i was nervous bc it's my first 30oz, but it did not disappoint!
This cup has been dropped many times and doesn't have a dent, it's very easy to carry and not heavy as long as it's not too full! Since it has been dropped so much it does leak some but when i first got it NO LEAKING so just avoid dropping your cup. It's great for the price because it will keep your drink cold all day weather it has ice or not and It's great for long trips!

I didn’t want one at first. Why would I need one when I already have a water bottle? And then I took a long car trip, and wished that my water bottle could fit in the cup holder, where I could easily access it. After that, the idea of owning one grew on me more and more.
After being gifted one last year, and ever increasingly finding myself making use of it as time went by, I thought that just the one was plenty.
Until a few months ago, when I finally decided that maybe getting an extra would be a good idea, as I hated to be without it even long enough to give it a needed wash and air-dry.

It’s greatly reduces risk of spills, especially for anyone who is concerned about having drinks anywhere near to electronic devices (computers, phones).

If you put ice in it, it can stay cool, or cold, depending on how much ice you put in it, for a long time.

Easy to clean, the lid can come apart (a bit hard to separate, but this also means it’s not doing so by accident), and the size is perfect. It can be a little heavy, but that is because of how sturdy and well-insulated it is.

amazon_reviews.review_title: Use it every day! Super cute!
amazon_reviews.review_comment:
Super cute and use it daily. I only wish that I didn't have to buy accessories to make it leakproof, since I intended for this to be a travel bottle. Unfortunately, I cannot trust it will not leak in my bag, but at least it encourages me to drink water and it keeps my water cold so if I get a migraine I can still wake up to a cold beverage.

I had a few issues with getting a scratched-up Stanley and one where the paint was coming off even with light washing (I use a special soft sponge and am super careful with my Stanley, so this was shocking to me), but the third one I got at least until the time of this writing has been really good! I hesitated to write a review for that reason, but now that enough time has passed without incident, I figured I could do so. I absolutely adore it and I keep it by my side at all times when I'm home, so I can drink more water, as someone who suffers from chronic migraines and requires a lot of hydration. It is super cute so that makes me want to drink it more. Sometimes, you have to trick yourself into doing your "musts," and make chores fun.

It is, of course, absolutely iconic too. Even if the Stanley craze has gone by, I sincerely love the cup, and the fact it was a wild trend was completely incidental for me.

I have issues with getting enough fluids in. My nutritionist suggested that I get a cup that would keep my water cold (since I only like it that way) and that had a straw to help me get more fluids in. After looking at a lot of different cups, I finally decided on this one.

I normally wouldn't spend this much on a cup. I do think it is pricey. But, having used it for a while, I now think it is well worth the money. My ice water stays cold until the last drop, even overnight. And using the straw has increased my fluid intake a lot. I had a hard time getting even a cup of water each day and already I'm up to about 5. Aside from a cup of coffee in the morning, water is all I drink so being able to increase my water intake by that much is a big improvement.

I probably won't be one of those people who buy cups to match my outfit, but I've definitely been converted into a Stanley cup fan. I love that it doesn't sweat on the outside and that it is easy to clean all the parts. For me, it has definitely been worth the investment.

items.title: Queen Size 4 Piece Sheet Set - Comfy Breathable & Cooling Sheets - Hotel Luxury Bed Sheets for Women and Men - Deep Pockets, Microfiber, Extra Soft & Wrinkle Free Sheets - White Oeko-Tex Bed Sheet Set

amazon_reviews.review_title: Finally we BOTH can sleep comfy!
amazon_reviews.review_comment:
So for years my boyfriend has always liked “jersey sheets” or “tee shirt” sheets or sheets made of flannel. He says he doesn’t like the feeling of cold “silky” feeling sheets as he’s always cold. I’m opposite and am always hot, and anytime we stayed in a nice hotel I looked forward to being able to sleep on cooler, taught, soft sheets for a couple of nights. I was able to deal with our old sheets but the issue we both hated was after awhile any sheet we got would get pilling. We even splurged and got a $60 flannel sheet which did the same thing forcing me to shave off these little annoying fuzz balls that make it feels like there is thousands of crumbs on the sheets. I also would wash our bedding once a week because the Jersey sheets seemed to “grow” as we move around in bed making it so the sheet was not taught and super annoying to lay on. The day I would wash them they would be comfortable but ultimately by the end of the week they would be almost hanging off our mattress. I ordered these sheets on a whim and got them the same day and immediately just threw out the jersey sheet and put this on (I didn’t even wash it, I know it’s gross but I was desperate for a comfy nights sleep and they came around 8pm) when I put them on I realized how soft and comfortable they felt. I also liked how the pillow cases are larger than most pillow cases that I have had in the past. We’ve been using these sheets for about a week and I love how I don’t wake up with my pillow popping out of the case anymore. The sheets have loosed ever so slightly since a week of sleeping but still are really taught and comfortable. They are cooler than flannel or fabric sheets and are initially cold when you first lay on them but I wouldn’t consider them “cooling” but they keep me from feeing extremely hot. They are way better than I ever would have expected for the price. I look forward to laying on them at the end of each day, even my boyfriend laid in bed the day I got them and said “wow I didn’t think I would like sheets like this, these are so soft!” And fell asleep immediately. We ended up ordering a second set in grey and the color is pretty. I still have yet to wash them, I usually use 2 tide pods when washing the bedding but I might get some fabric softener (as I hear it helps with pilling) to prevent the possibility of having that happen to these sheets in the future. I am hoping they hold up well after the wash and longer use. If they start to pill after wash, I will come back and update my review. Until then, I would highly recommend these sheets for the quality and the price point that they are offered at. Honestly, at this point even if they pill months from now I probably wouldn’t even be upset as long as they stay the same price I would just buy another set as they are just that comfortable and soft.
UPDATE: So it has been about 3 months since I have purchase and used these sheets. They are still as soft as the day I first put them on. I’ve been washing them bi-weekly along with my comforter and pillowcases. I wash them with warm water using a combination of tide pods and added Downy fabric softener. They say to hang dry them in the description but I have been putting them in the dryer on medium and have been taking them out after around 20-25 minutes, they seem to dry extremely quickly. They have yet to have absolutely any pilling  and also have not shrunk or stretched. Also I have a cat that is very active and also sleeps with me who enjoys kneading on my bed and I haven’t even noticed any signs of wear what so ever to the eye or to the feel. I highly recommend these sheets. I still have yet to even open the second set I purchased!

So I found out that this is the same "TYPE" of bedding that Hilton hotels use, and I always stay at hiltons through work, and like how their bedding feels . Needless to say I need to buy a couple more sets of these as I like how they feel, look, and wash.

PROS: Cheap for a bed set of good quality, colors are nice, they wash up good, and feel nice.

Cons: I don't have maid and turn down service at my house!

Get a set and test em out... I bet for the price you'll be happy too!

amazon_reviews.review_title: Nice sheets with a low price
amazon_reviews.review_comment: I ordered 2 sets of these because of the price and was pleasantly surprised at the softness of these sheets. They fit great and the only thing I have noticed is they are pilling just a little bit. We will see how well they last.

The quality of these sheets is outstanding. The fit my 10” king size mattress perfectly. We got the color “spa blue” because it matches our quilt the best and it is so pretty! They look like luxury sheets but they were so cheap and they’re so comfortable to lay and sleep on. They do wrinkle a little bit, but nothing too bad at all. We washed ours when we first received them before we even put them on the bed. Washed them according to the instructions on the tag and they held up great. No pilling at all, not even a loose string anywhere. We love them and highly recommend! My husband gets hot when he sleeps always, and these definitely do their job on the cooking part too. All around a 10/10, will buy again.

These sheets are very nice. The workmanship is splendid. I bought the blue striped. The color is like worn denim. I washed and dried them on a warm setting and they came out wrinkle free. And they are so soft. I put them on my guest bed and I kinda want to sleep in that guest room just to sleep on that softness. I totally recommend them. I may have to get a set for my king bed!
The sheets were a beautiful color (beige) and the quality is excellent. Very soft and fit on a thick matress.  I will be buying more in the future.

I was a bit suspicious that sheets this cheap could be of a good quality but I was really surprised! They're so soft and comfortable and fit over my thick mattress. I loved my first set so much I bought 2 more. The colors are lovely.

amazon_reviews.review_title: Bottom sheet does not stay smooth.
amazon_reviews.review_comment:
I have bought 2 pairs of these sheets for my king Tempur-Pedic bed and both of the sets have the same issue in that the bottom sheet does not stay tight.
Pros:  The sheets are very soft, they wash up well and do not seem to pill.  I have had them for several months now.
Cons: As above, the bottom sheet gets loose and is quite wrinkled after a few nights.  The sheet does not come off the bed, but it definitely requires re-tucking almost every day. It seems like they need stronger, tighter elastic.

I bought these sheets for myself to use on my queen size bed.  I have one if those new "THICKK" memory foam beds with the adjustable frame for reading, watching TV, etc.  These sheets are all they claim to be and I do really like them.  They are deep and fit my bed well enough and are really comfortable and soft.  But, I only wish they had sewn-in-place corner straps such as other sheet manufactures have.  While the sheets stay on my bed well enough while I'm laying flat, I find that the corners have a tendency to slip off when I incline and then recline my bed.
I would still highly recommend these sheets for "regular" beds.

I searched for cotton sheets and was fooled into buying these. It's not like I accidentally clicked on a sponsored listing. This was a regular listing in with the cotton sheets. The high ratings lured me in. Don't get me wrong, I like microfiber sheets, but I did not want them this time. I doubt that the seller will see this and I doubt anything will be done about it. I should have read the reviews before buying. Apparently I'm not the only one who was tricked into buying these when they searched for cotton sheets, as I found later in the reviews. These sheets are super soft and comfortable, but they are not cotton.

items.title: Amazon Basics - 4-Piece Microfiber Lightweight Wrinkle-free Bed Sheet Set, Super Soft Easy Care, 14'' Deep Pockets, Queen, Bright White, Solid

amazon_reviews.review_comment:
I am thoroughly impressed with the Amazon Basics Deluxe Microfiber Sheet Set! From the moment I unpacked these sheets, I could tell they were of exceptional quality. The softness is remarkable—it's like sleeping on a cloud. Even after multiple washes, the fabric has maintained its plush feel, and there’s no sign of pilling.

The Spa Blue Striped pattern is elegant and versatile, adding a touch of sophistication to my bedroom. The colors are vibrant but not overwhelming, striking the perfect balance between style and subtlety. They genuinely look and feel much more expensive than they are, making them a fantastic value.

The fit is perfect for my queen-sized mattress, and the elastic on the fitted sheet keeps everything securely in place, even with a mattress topper. These sheets have quickly become my favorite set, and I would highly recommend them to anyone looking for luxury on a budget. Great job, Amazon Basics!

I recently purchased the Amazon Basics Lightweight Super Soft Easy Care Microfiber 4-Piece Bed Sheet Set, and I couldn't be happier with my choice! These sheets are incredibly soft and comfortable, making my bed feel like a cozy haven. The microfiber material is lightweight yet durable, and it has held up well after several washes without any signs of wear or pilling.

The 14-inch deep pockets fit my mattress perfectly, and the sheets stay in place all night without slipping off. I also appreciate how easy they are to care for – just toss them in the washing machine and dryer, and they come out looking as good as new.

This is the third set that I have bought, not because they wear out, but because they are so comfortable and I change these sheets regularly. Overall, I highly recommend these sheets to anyone looking for a high-quality, affordable bedding option. They have exceeded my expectations in every way!

amazon_reviews.review_title: So many colors to pick from!
amazon_reviews.review_comment: The Amazon Basics Lightweight Super Soft Microfiber 4-Piece Bed Sheet Set is a fantastic choice for both comfort and affordability! The microfiber material is incredibly soft and feels luxurious against the skin, providing a cozy night's sleep. The cream color is elegant and neutral, blending beautifully with any bedroom decor. The 14-inch deep pockets fit perfectly on my king-size mattress, even with a mattress topper, and the sheets stay securely in place. They are also easy to care for—washing and drying them is a breeze with no signs of pilling or fading. Overall, this set is a great value for quality and comfort. Highly recommend!

For the price point, this is an attractive, comfortable set of sheets.  They've been washed a few times so far and are holding up well.  They grey color I purchased is attractive and the queen size is exactly as advertised.

amazon_reviews.review_title: Amazing HOWEVER know what your buying
amazon_reviews.review_comment:
Have a few microfiber sheets and love them!  Few things to know about these if you have never had them before. Microfiber is the same as polyester and retains heat, they're not breathable.  Also they're paper thin but still strong despite appearences.  The elastic on the fitted sheets for all microfiber sheets are very weak however I always use sheet straps under the mattress and never have to worry about that, they also have a slick but luxurious feel to them.  Microfiber sheets are not for everyone and I hate seeing people write bad reviews based on the natural way these sheets are ment to be.

Don't let this review steer you away for these as they're litteraly just as comfortable as great quality cotton sheets as long as you can handle what I mentioned above.  Good Luck!

The price? Amazing. The quality? So good. These are super buttery soft, the colors and patterns are so pretty and they are well made. I love how light they are for carrying, changing and storage. These are my second set of them and I just love them so! CANNOT be beat on price and quality.

amazon_reviews.review_title: Affordable and Comfortable Microfiber Sheet Set
amazon_reviews.review_comment: The Amazon Basics Lightweight Microfiber Bed Sheet Set delivers impressive comfort and practicality. The fabric is soft, lightweight, and breathable, ideal for everyday use. The fitted sheet’s 14-inch pocket depth accommodates most mattresses snugly, and the sheets maintain their shape and color after washing. A budget-friendly, easy-care option for comfortable bedding.

I have to admit I’m the kind of person that usually just buy whatever I can put on my bed that’s affordable well I moved into a new place and I wanted to buy something different  I bought them in white and let me tell you I slept in luxury  I I know being a grown adult you think I would take better care of the kind of bedding I put on my bed, but I don’t really think about. This is spoiled me and made me realize I need to take better care of my bedding and buy better sheets.  I tend to have a lot of night sweats. They did not seem to cause that kind of problem like normal sheets through that I purchased these sheets are durable. They feel great. They look great. The size was great. The color was great. I highly recommend.

For two years. Two years I suffered in silence. Yes. I.... I a struggling young adult struggled with only one... Yes that's right ONE set of sheets. Every week it was the same. Strip the bed. Wash the sheets, dry the sheets, remake the bed. Over the 2 years my one poor set of sheets took a beating. They saw countless menstrual cycles, various cold and flue viruses, dogs, and sleep overs. I meticulously washed and  bleached those sheets until one day I took them from the wash and noted that they were beyond bleaching or stain removal. There were dying.... They were dying gray.

I searched high and low. Went to target and TJ Maxx... But to no avail. Why... Why were simple square pieces of fabric $50.00!?!?!? I could not afford this. I could not justify the spending of $50.00 on plain white fabric. So I searched. I searched high and I searched low Until I came here...
To The Amazon.

It was here. Here I discovered them. Plain white sheets at a modest and affordable price.
"Don't buy them! You'll regret it! You need Egyptian cotton!" My mother said.

"No! I care not what cotton they be! All I need are sheets! I have no one to impress! No one who shares my bed! I am a lowly virgin promised in matrimony to another with a sworn vow of chastity! I care not for fancy sheets!" I shouted.

So I bought them. I made my bed and I laid in it. And I can tell you that yes... They are I fact sheets that you can sleep in.

So far so good I haven't had any issue with them I haven't washed them yet I'm getting ready to wash them and see how they work but my mattress is a pillow mattress and my mattress sucks and I haven't ever found the right sheet for it fitted sheet for it and so far so good it fits perfectly doesn't pop off when I move around or anything so hopefully it doesn't shrink I bought a queen for my full and then my other pair I bought are the black ones and that one I bought as a full so I haven't used those yet so hopefully if the queen shrinks and I'm going to be in trouble with the full but I'm crossing my fingers

items.title: Barossa Design Plastic Shower Liner Clear - Premium PEVA Shower Curtain Liner with Rustproof Grommets and 3 Magnets, Waterproof Cute Lightweight Standard Size Shower Curtains for Bathroom - Clear

amazon_reviews.review_comment: Bought the 12G heavy duty shower curtain about six weeks ago after buying a different brand twelve months ago.  I have been getting more leary of the offerings on Amazon due to increasing bad experiences, but this was a good purchase for our home because the clear material has no pores so it does not hold soap residue and the thickness makes it easy to do general cleaning without damaging the grommet connections.  This is a very thick and clear shower curtain, but way better than the frosted ones that have texture which holds soap residue - the last one we bought turned pink in a few months and would not come clean.  It was disgusting even right after being cleaned because of the pink hue.  Then it began to show mildew stains that would not come off even with scrubbing both sides.  Finally tried using a bleach solution and the material became brittle which is weird.  I would recommend and buy again.
It's heavy clear and very nice. It's well made and will not tear.

amazon_reviews.review_title: Long and durable enough, but would like it to be a bit more weighted at the base
amazon_reviews.review_comment: This shower curtain liner is a great size, and good quality. It’s been several months, and it’s not dirty yet. It stops water from getting out of the shower but doesn’t make the shower feel stuffy. My only complaint is that it’s not weighted enough at the bottom, and tends to leave a gap between curtain and wall where it rides up.
It is a little thinner than expected, but it does the job of a shower curtain.

amazon_reviews.review_title: Best Shower Curtain Liner I've Ever Used
amazon_reviews.review_comment:
Nice clear, heavy-enough curtain.

It has SIX magnets on the bottom. Every other liner I've used had only three. The six magnets mean there is one on each end. When you get into the shower and close the curtain, you can wrap each end slightly into the tub, and stick it down to keep out the cold air from freezing you.

To avoid the "chimney" effect of the curtain being sucked into your legs during your shower, adjust the middle two magnets, pulling them as far apart as possible, so the curtain is flat against the inside of the bathtub. It will billow slightly, but not all the way into the tub.

Ordered another one.
Fit our small shower perfectly.  It is a little on the sheer side.
I like that there are 6 magnets to help hold the curtain in place.  I also like that you can’t see through it yet it lets tons of light through. This curtain is definitely worth buying.

I love this because it's actually clear! The material is good quality while still being lightweight. It's not so light that it flies everywhere but it's not super heavy and thick in a way that I don't like. Since it's clear it actually lets light through, even with my outside curtain over it. That would probably depend on the color of your curtain but that's how it works for me. It hasn't accumulated any gross shower stuff, it's easier to rinse off if you feel you got conditioner or soap on it

amazon_reviews.review_title: Pay attention to how many magnets each one comes with!!
amazon_reviews.review_comment: I have bought the 1B. Clear heavy curtain in the past and loved it, we just needed a new one from typical wear and tear over a few years. I decided to order the 1a. Clear liner this time bc we don’t need a super thick liner. I was very disappointed this time, not by the thickness but by the lack of magnets compared to our old curtain. The thinner one only comes with 3 magnets, which is not enough to keep the liner from blowing inward on you the entire time you shower. Needless to say, I reordered the 1B heavy liner that comes with 6 magnets so I can shower without constantly pushing the curtain off of me. Other than the thin liner lacking extra magnets, the product was still good.

amazon_reviews.review_title: An inexpensive solution for a shower curtain
amazon_reviews.review_comment: I go through several of these over the course of the year because I live in an area where I have a well and hence hard water and the brown stain is hard to avoid unless you are diligent in cleaning it up each time you use the shower.  I try to keep up, but get lazy or am in a hurry.  Anyway, not a big out put of cash to buy these periodically.  I recommend.

items.title: Owala FreeSip SS, 24-oz, Camo Cool

amazon_reviews.review_title: Innovative and Convenient Water Bottle – A New Favorite!
amazon_reviews.review_comment:
The Owala FreeSip water bottle has quickly become my go-to for staying hydrated throughout the day. It has a clever design that stands out from other bottles I’ve tried.

Pros:
 • FreeSip Spout: The dual sipping option is a game-changer! You can sip through the built-in straw or tilt the bottle and drink directly. It’s incredibly convenient whether I’m on the go or sitting at my desk.
 • Leak-Proof Design: The flip-top lid locks securely, and I haven’t had any spills, even when tossing it into a bag.
 • Keeps Drinks Cold: The insulation is impressive—it keeps my water ice-cold for hours, even in hot weather.
 • Easy to Carry: The integrated handle is comfortable and makes it easy to grab and go.

Cons:
 • Cleaning: While the bottle is mostly easy to clean, the straw mechanism can be a little tricky to thoroughly wash without a straw brush.
 • Size: The larger sizes can be a bit bulky, so they might not fit well in all cup holders or smaller bags.

Overall: The Owala FreeSip water bottle combines style, function, and innovation perfectly. It’s an excellent choice for anyone looking for a versatile, high-quality water bottle. Despite minor drawbacks, I highly recommend it for staying hydrated wherever you are!

I love this water bottle. The straw and sip feature is unique, it fits in backpacks and car cup holders, the color combo is cute, stays cold or hot, easy to carry with the loop, can knock over and not spill. No complaints!

Great water bottle. I use them year round. This one keeps water very cold all during the summer. Love the way the straw works. And if you don’t want that— great for sipping. It grips easily in your hands. It does not fit great in the cup holder of my car— my only negative. Fun color selection. Very durable.
Its big, stays cold, pretty colors, and just a great water bottle for a college student

I’ve been looking for a good water bottle with great insulation and this one is it. The quality is amazing and I absolutely LOVE the color scheme. It is leak proof and the two different sip modes are so convenient. The lock feature is definitely amazing!

I have used so many different kinds of water bottles and none have left me satisfied, but this one is the best one I have had!! I love the style of the water bottle, it is very unique. It keeps my water cool for a long time which is exactly what I need. It is comfortable to carry around. It isn’t too heavy which is really good. It fits in a back nicely. I take it everywhere with me!! I take it to the gym, school, and use it when I’m at home all the time. Very good water bottle and I would 100% buy another one.

amazon_reviews.review_title: Beverage stays cooooold! Lid sticks a bit.
amazon_reviews.review_comment:
This does a very good job of keeping the beverage cold. VERY GOOD!  I add a few ice cubes and the water stays super cold over night and even longer. Without ice, it stays cold but not like it does with the added ice. I like the multi colors and the ability to sip through the provided straw or tip like a glass. I also like the cover that protects the drinking area and the handle to carry. Also like that you can snap protective lid close and carry by holding the body. Another nice feature for my small hands is the flat area that makes it easier to carry.

My only complaint— the button you press to open the lid, stopped working flawlessly after I had it in the freezing weather while watching people sled.  It opens but sticks and needs some assistance to open. The freeze affected it.
So good I bought a second one. I love this bottle ! It fits in car cup holders, doesn’t leak, and you can sip or gulp. Keeps water cold for a long period of time as well.

I like the way you can tilt to drink or use like a straw. It does keep drinks cold. Nice lid feature and ring for carrying. Does not leak. The only negative is they did not send me the color I ordered. I ordered cool camo but I got pistachio. I was taking it on a trip so I didn’t have time to exchange it. So I just kept the color they sent me.

amazon_reviews.review_title: Best way to get your H20 in!
amazon_reviews.review_comment: I’ve tried almost every type of water bottle out there- Stanley, Zak, Hydroflask, Nalgene, Contigo, Camelback, Simple Modern and more! Owala reigns supreme out of all of them because one reason- it doesn’t LEAK! At all! I’ve finally found my holy grail of water bottles. I don’t need to worry about my bag being drenched with water on my way to the office. I don’t need to worry about water leaking all over my kid’s backpack. I absolutely love it and the kids do too! :)

items.title: Bedsure Satin Pillowcase for Hair and Skin Queen - Silver Grey Silky Pillowcase 20x30 Inches - Set of 2 with Envelope Closure, Similar to Silk Pillow Cases, Gifts for Women Men

amazon_reviews.review_title: Luxurious Comfort and Benefits – Bedsure Satin Pillowcase is a Game-Changer for Hair and Skin!
amazon_reviews.review_comment:
I recently purchased the Bedsure Satin Pillowcase for Hair and Skin in silver grey, and it has quickly become a must-have in my bedtime routine. This pillowcase is a true game-changer for anyone looking to improve the quality of their sleep and the health of their hair and skin.

First off, the satin material is incredibly soft and smooth. It feels luxurious against my skin, and I’ve noticed a significant reduction in hair frizz and tangling since I started using it. Unlike cotton pillowcases that can cause friction and breakage, the satin allows my hair to glide over the surface, preventing split ends and reducing bedhead in the morning. I’ve also noticed my skin feels softer and less irritated, as satin is gentle on the face and helps reduce sleep lines.

The 20x30-inch size fits perfectly on my queen-sized pillow, and the silver grey color is sleek and elegant, adding a touch of luxury to my bedroom. The pillowcase is well-made, with strong stitching and a smooth, high-quality finish. It’s also easy to care for – I’ve washed it several times, and it retains its softness and smoothness without any signs of wear.

amazon_reviews.review_comment:
Great product that delivers on its promises. It’s highly effective in reducing acne, making it a reliable choice for anyone dealing with breakouts. What sets it apart is its versatility—it’s also fantastic for odor control in areas like the armpits. I like to use it every so often, especially in the summer time (iykyk!) Simply apply it, leave it on for a minute or two, and rinse thoroughly. It leaves your skin feeling clean and refreshed, tackling multiple concerns at once.

That being said, one important note is to rinse it off completely. If any residue is left behind on your skin, it can transfer onto towels or clothing and cause stains or bleaching. I learned this the hard way, so I now make sure to rinse thoroughly to avoid damaging my towels.

Overall, this is an excellent product for both acne management and body odor control. Just use it carefully and ensure it’s fully rinsed off for the best results!

I have scoured the earth for an effective face wash for my skin. Tried almost all of the trending face washes on instagram and TikTok such as cerave, laroche-posay, cetaphil, vanicream, and so much more. I discovered this product 3 years ago and have used it religiously since. It makes my combination skin so smooth, and prevents breakouts. It is PERFECT if you pair it with an oil cleanser, as it is a little thick and has a hard time cleaning out the sebaceous filaments in your pores (I recommend DHC cleansing oil). The product can also be a little drying! So make sure you pair it with good products that replenish your skin moisture barrier (hyaluronic acid, good moisturizer like Laroche-posay or pods). And finally, yes it does bleach things!!! I combat this with buying white towels, and rotating my bath towels between the same 3 so I don’t bleach all of them!
